page.title: 11SHOPKEEPER
page.content: Our village shop stocks most things and it is used by the whole village. Some people do all their shopping there but most people actually only buy a few things,preferring to buy their weekly groceries at larger supermarkets where prices are cheaper. The main village shop is part of a larger chain called Spar,it is also a Post Office so it is important to local people especially the old for their pensions.The local post is sorted from this Post Office and many locals collect papers from the newsagent part.There is also a butcher who used to work for another butcher in the next village,but now has his own shop and it is very popular.There used to be many other shops in the village but as people got more transport they went to the towns.
